name: Solitaire - Wonderland Adventure
description:
Vertical layout of solitaire puzzle game, add unique witch elements. The evil dragon Skrill steals Philosopher's Wand from the witch kingdom. To save the witch kingdom, Winnie and her friend Wilbur the Persian cat embarked on an adventure! Help them catch the dragon Skrill!

♠ Classic Tripeaks Solitaire Gameplay.
♠ Free, fun, and confusing card layouts, choose your strategy to crack!
♠ Hundreds of levels, and more levels will be added regularly!
♠ Login now for free and you will get 100 diamonds for free. In addition, you will receive a daily login reward every day.
♠ Visit your friends on FACEBOOK and save the progress of the game, and you will be rewarded!
♠ Compete with friends in the list to win super rich awards!

Come and adventure with Winnie and Wilbur the cat! Take back the Philosopher's Wand!

Pyramid Solitarie is the most popular classic card game in the world.
Try it now and Play OFFLINE in anytime or anywhere! Our Patience Slotaire will make you feel more exciting and more addictive!

------------Follow us on FACEBOOK!-------------
